# * Written By --------

# * IIIT Hyderabad *****
# */

t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    n=input()
    count=0
    for i in range(1,n+1):
        j=i
        while(j!=0):
            if(j%2==1):
                count+=1
            j=j/2
    print count
